channel.title: Help with adding one shop
channel.description:
well this is the code I put for shops.cgf - shop = 68 Ye_Olde_Armour_Shop 1 1 1159 5000 1197 4000 1121 7000 1085 5000 1071 5000 1161 5000 1199 5000 1123 10000 1091 7000 1073 7000 1163 30000 1201 35000 1094 45000 1079 45000 1127 50000
this is the code I put for spawn.cgf- spawn = 23 2872 3599 0 0 0 0 0 1 Armour_Shop
this is the code I put for client.java }else if (NPCID == 23) { //Ye Olde Armour Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68; // Knight of Ardougne and this is the error I get when I try to run server - - Allstar-Scape v1 - .. Online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 5000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:31) at server.main(server.java:29)
Also if you are wondering, yes I am using Allstar-Scape as a base =D
Can someone tell me whats wrong with it?

item.title: Help with adding one shop
item.dc:creator: @ShadowGod ShadowGod
item.description:
@ShadowGod wrote:

well this is the code I put for shops.cgf -
shop = 68 Ye_Olde_Armour_Shop 1 1 1159 5000 1197 4000 1121 7000 1085 5000 1071 5000 1161 5000 1199 5000 1123 10000 1091 7000 1073 7000 1163 30000 1201 35000 1094 45000 1079 45000 1127 50000

this is the code I put for spawn.cgf-
spawn = 23 2872 3599 0 0 0 0 0 1 Armour_Shop

this is the code I put for client.java
}else if (NPCID == 23) { //Ye Olde Armour Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 68; // Knight of Ardougne
and this is the error I get when I try to run server -

  • Allstar-Scape v1 -
    … Online!
    Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
    5000"
    at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
    at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:131)
    at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:31)
    at server.main(server.java:29)

Also if you are wondering, yes I am using Allstar-Scape as a base =D

Can someone tell me whats wrong with it?

Read full topic
